text:
Love is in the air?

David Foster seems to have a new lady in his life, and it’s none other than Elizabeth Hurley.

E! News is reporting that the model turned actress and the successful music producer are in the “early stages�? of “dating�? following a years-long friendship that only recently turned romantic.

The rumored couple sparked dating rumors when they were spotted boarding a private jet in Italy.

So, how did David and Elizabeth get together?

An insider explains, “They have known each other for years now as they have many mutual friends, but recently became romantic… [David] talks very highly of Elizabeth.�?

As for their getaway, a separate source says David and Elizabeth joined a large group of family and friends “for about three days as they cruised around Sardinia.�?

“They looked like a couple in the beginning stages of getting to know each other,�? an insider dished. “They were with a group of friends, but they had some private flirty moments together where they laughed and got close.�?

This is Elizabeth’s first relationship since splitting from her ex- Shane Warne in 2013.

Meanwhile, David has been linked to a string of women since his 2015 split from Yolanda Hadid.

In fact, David admitted to Vanity Fair in January that this is longest he’s ever been single.

“I tend to go from marriage to marriage—leaving one wife for another,�? Foster explains. “This is the first time in my adult life that I’ve been single. It’s a very powerful feeling, but I’m not used to it.�?

It seems like every week David is linked to another woman. I think it’s good he’s taking time and playing the field instead of just jumping into another marriage.

Do David and Elizabeth make a good couple? Are you surprised David has been playing the field? Will David and Elizabeth last?
